Title: Planning and Rural Development
Author: মোঃ আফসার আলম
Summary: Planning and Rural Development In this book an attempt has been made to beautiful explain the role of planning for the integrated rural development. in its vast canvas, agricultural resource base, agricultural land use planning, integrated block level planning, integrated micro-level service centre planning have been comprehensively discussed. This book is an outcome of a genuine research work. It may be helpful for post graduate students as a ready reference material. Apart from this, it may also be useful for the research scholars, academicians, professionals and policy makers.
